my bestfriend is from out of town.

i am a soccer mom.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! Just finished my last class for the week and now I'm headed home to spend some time with my kids.
Oh that sounds nice! I'm working on a project with my dad right now. We're building a new garden in our backyard.
That sounds like a fun project! I love gardening, but I don't have a lot of space at my house.
We have a pretty big yard, so we have plenty of space for a garden. And we love to grow our own vegetables.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to grow my own vegetables, but I've never had the space.
You should definitely give it a try! It's so much fun to watch your vegetables grow and then be able to eat them.
I know, I know! I'll have to see if I can find a place to grow some vegetables.
You should! It's a great way to get fresh, healthy food and it's also a lot of fun.
I'm convinced! I'll have to start planning my garden.
Awesome! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
